sourcesContent:
import { Avatar } from "@mui/material"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import Footer from "../Components/Footer"; import Header from "../Components/Header"; import { user_details } from "../Redux/Actions/userLoginAction"; import EditIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Edit'; import { KeyboardArrowDown } from "@mui/icons-material"; import { useraddress } from "../Redux/Actions/addressAction"; const UserProfile = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [address, setAddress] = useState(false) const userDetails = useSelector(state=>state.userDetails) const token = localStorage?.getItem("userInfo")?.split('"')[3] useEffect(() => { if (localStorage.getItem("userInfo")) { const token = localStorage.getItem("userInfo").split('"')[3] dispatch(user_details(token)) } }, []) const [city,setCity] = useState(userDetails?.user?.message?.city) const [state,setState] = useState(userDetails?.user?.message?.state) const [pincode,setPincode] = useState(userDetails?.user?.message?.pincode) const [landmark,setLandMark] = useState(userDetails?.user?.message?.landmark) const [data_address,setDataAddress] = useState(userDetails?.user?.message?.data_address) return ( <>
{userDetails?.user?.message?.userName?.charAt(0)?.toUpperCase()}

{userDetails?.user?.message?.userName}

Mobile : {userDetails?.user?.message?.phone}

Email : {userDetails?.user?.message?.email}

Address

{ setAddress(!address) }} />
{address && <>
{setCity(e.target.value)}} />
{setState(e.target.value)}}/>
{setPincode(e.target.value)}}/>
{setDataAddress(e.target.value)}} />
{setLandMark(e.target.value)}} />
{setAddress(!address)}} className="flex items-center text-black justify-center rounded-md border border-transparent bg-zinc-200 px-6 py-3 text-base font-medium text-white shadow-sm ">Back
{dispatch(useraddress(city,state,pincode,data_address,landmark,token));setAddress(!address)}} className="flex items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-transparent bg-blue-800 px-6 py-3 text-base font-medium text-white shadow-sm ">Save
} {!address && <>

City : {userDetails?.user?.message?.city}

State : {userDetails?.user?.message?.state}

Zip : {userDetails?.user?.message?.pincode}

Address : {userDetails?.user?.message?.data_address}

Landmark : {userDetails?.user?.message?.landmark}

}

Recent Order

) } export default UserProfile;
